value.name: INSIDE
value.comment: Limit drawing the Screen 2 window to inside its bounds.

value.name: OUTSIDE
value.comment: Limit drawing the Screen 2 window to outside its bounds.

port.name: DISPLAY_BACK
port.comment: The display's background shade/color.

port.name: DISPLAY_LINE
port.comment:
The current line being drawn by the display.
Note that final color translation is applied with a one-line delay; for changing LCD shade or color palette values, subtract 1 from this value.

port.name: DISPLAY_LINE_IRQ
port.comment: The line on the start of which the line interurpt should be requested.

port.name: SPR_BASE
port.comment: Base address of sprite table data.

port.name: SPR_FIRST
port.comment: First sprite to draw from the sprite table (0 - 127).

port.name: SPR_COUNT
port.comment: Number of consecutive sprites to draw from the sprite table (1 - 128).

port.name: SCR_BASE
port.comment: Base address of screen layer data.

port.name: SCR2_WIN_X1
port.comment: Left-most pixel of the Screen 2 window.

port.name: SCR2_WIN_Y1
port.comment: Top-most pixel of the Screen 2 window.

port.name: SCR2_WIN_X2
port.comment: Right-most pixel of the Screen 2 window.

port.name: SCR2_WIN_Y2
port.comment: Bottom-most pixel of the Screen 2 window.

port.name: SPR_WIN_X1
port.comment: Left-most pixel of the sprite window.

port.name: SPR_WIN_Y1
port.comment: Top-most pixel of the sprite window.

port.name: SPR_WIN_X2
port.comment: Right-most pixel of the sprite window.

port.name: SPR_WIN_Y2
port.comment: Bottom-most pixel of the sprite window.

port.name: SCR1_SCRL_X
port.comment: X drawing offset of the Screen 1 layer.

port.name: SCR1_SCRL_Y
port.comment: Y drawing offset of the Screen 1 layer.

port.name: SCR2_SCRL_X
port.comment: X drawing offset of the Screen 2 layer.

port.name: SCR2_SCRL_Y
port.comment: Y drawing offset of the Screen 2 layer.

port.name: LCD_CTRL
port.comment: Controls LCD driver functionality.

port.name: LCD_ICON
port.comment: Controls the visibility of LCD sidebar icons.

bit.name: SLEEP
bit.comment: Sleep segment icon, depicted as a star.

port.name: LCD_VTOTAL
port.comment:
The final line preceding line counter restart and the beginning of active display. By default, this is set to 158, which equals 159 total lines per frame.
For safety reasons, this should only be set to even values.

port.name: LCD_STN_VSYNC
port.comment: On STN models (WS/WSC), this controls the start of the vertical back porch. For compatibility, this should always be set to 3 less than LCD_VTOTAL.

port.name: LCD_NEXT_LINE
port.comment: The next line to start drawing on. Write-only. Not recommended for use.

port.name: LCD_ICON_LATCH
port.comment: Latched (SoC-controlled) icon status/control.
